thread.section_title: HelloFresh US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HelloFresh US | hellofresh.com | 4 of 259
thread.title: Alison

author: Alison
title: Alison
text: I love picking out my 3 meals for the week and look forward to learning and cooking new recipes! The food is delicious and I've been recommending HelloFresh to friends, family and coworkers every day since I tasted my first HelloFresh meal! I'm a flight attendant and it's nice to be able to cook the meals and pack them up for my trips and not worry about buying too much food at the grocery store and having it go bad while I'm traveling for work! Thanks for making my life a little less stressful, and a little more full of joy!
